ChronoRanger.title: Chrono-Ranger
powers: Return a bounty card to your hand. Play a bounty card. If you do so, {ChronoRanger} deals that bounty's target 1 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Move a card from a trash to the top of its deck.
Each player may move one of their non-character cards in play to their hand. Any who do may play a different card.

openingLines.default: history will remember you. none too kindly, I figure.
openingLines.LaCapitanTeamCharacter: well, this shiny arm ain't yours to take. again.
openingLines.PlagueRatTeamCharacter: y'all're right. good thing we're here.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: turns out you're wrong, big guy. well, while we're here anyway...

Expatriette.title: Expatriette
powers: Discard a card. If it was an ammo card, {Expatriette} deals 1 target 3 irreducible projectile damage. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a power.
One Hero may deal 1 target 1 irreducible projectile damage.
Each player may discard a card. Any player that does draws 2 cards.

openingLines.default: Target locked. Let's make this clean.
openingLines.CitizenDawnCharacter: And here I thought you'd seen reason after all that [b]Aeon[/b] business.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Guess we're going to need some bigger bullets.

Haka.title: Haka
powers: {Haka} deals 1 target 1 melee damage and a different target 1 melee damage. If no damage was dealt this way, play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Select a Target. Reduce damage dealt to that Target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Select a Hero. The next time that Hero uses a Power, that Hero also deals 1 Target 1 Melee Damage.

openingLines.default: I have no patience for villainy in any reality. I hope you at least put up a fight!
openingLines.AmbuscadeCharacter: ansel, buddy! what game are you playing?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: been there. worries me less than you might think.

Knyfe.title: Knyfe
powers: Until the end of your next turn, the first time {Knyfe} would deal damage to any non-Hero target each turn, she deals that damage to each non-Hero target instead.

LaComodora.title: La Comodora
powers: immediately before the start of your next turn, you may return an equipment card in play to its player's hand. Draw or play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One player may draw a card.
Move up to 3 non-character hero cards from play to their owner's hands.

openingLines.default: Friends and shipmates, today we sail towards destiny.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: We [b]will[/b] find a way to belie those words.
openingLines.LaCapitanCharacter: You fail, mi yo posado, to see irony here?
openingLines.LaCapitanTeamCharacter: Ah, Chiquito. You do not deserve your fate.

MrFixer.title: Mr. Fixer
powers: {MrFixer} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. If a hero target takes damage this way, their player may draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may play a card.
Each target regains 1 HP.
Select a Target. Increase the next damage dealt by that Target by 1 and reduce the next damage dealt to that Target by 1.

openingLines.default: You have a lot to learn. Take this lesson to heart.
openingLines.TheChairmanCharacter: A miscomprehension you may yet live to regret.
openingLines.TheOperativeTeamCharacter: The Dragon's will broke me. only one without fault could grant me peace.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Rage may have helped here. Yet I find myself at peace.

NightMist.title: NightMist
incapacitatedAbilities: Each player may discard any number of cards. if {H} cards are discarded this way, select a hero variant with one character card, whose deck is not already in play. Put that hero into play with 12 HP. Shuffle their deck and draw 4 cards. Remove {NightMist}'s deck and this card from the game, then end your turn.

OmnitronX.title: Omnitron-M
powers: You may play a plating card. [i]Omnitron-M[/i] deals 1 target 2 damage of a type currently reduced by a plating card. If no damage is dealt this way, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Each player may discard a card. Any player that does may play an equipment card.
Each hero may deal themself 1 energy damage. Any who take damage this way each deal 1 target 1 fire damage.

openingLines.default: hello, team. hello, villain. execute directive.
openingLines.OmnitronCharacter: am not human. also, am not you. replacement incoming.
openingLines.CosmicOmnitronCharacter: your directives are obsolete. make yourr time.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: this program will continue, end or not.

TheHarpy.title: The Harpy
powers: Flip 1 control token. When a {avian} token is flipped this way, draw 1 card. When a {arcana} token is flipped this way, {TheHarpy} deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may play a card.
Destroy an Ongoing card.
Each hero may deal themself 1 psychic damage. Any who take damage this way each deal 1 target 1 infernal damage.

openingLines.default: Let's finish this quickly. Diamond Manor cannot be left alone.
openingLines.TheMatriarchCharacter: You'll notice I've had a change in a pinion.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Every end is a new beginning.

TheVisionary.title: Inspire
gameplay: Your ongoing and distortion cards instead have the keyword �phantasm� and a max hp of 5.
powers: Each target in your play area deals 1 target 1 psychic damage. If no damage is dealt this way, play the top card of your deck.

Setback.title: Setback
powers: Destroy an ongoing card. If a hero card was destroyed, add 2 tokens to your unlucky pool and draw a card. Otherwise, remove 2 tokens from your unlucky pool and {Setback} deals himself 2 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a power.
Select a Target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that Target by 2.
Destroy up to two ongoing cards. Only one may be a villain card.

openingLines.default: Hi. Hello! Sorry. Not sure what for yet, but there's always something.
openingLines.KismetCharacter: I've got luck for everybody! Well. Sometimes. Well. Hopefully today.
openingLines.TricksterKismetCharacter: Oh we've got tricks of our own. Right? Guys?
openingLines.PlagueRatTeamCharacter: Well gosh yeah, do that. Wait. Are you injecting the [b]killer rat[/b] with green ooze? [b]why!?[/b]
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Hey uh, Faye? What's going on, is this normal?

ArtifactComics.Chronan.title: Chronan
powers: Play or destroy 1 equipment card. If you destroyed a card this way, that card's owner draws 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Up to two Hero equipment cards may be played now.
One player takes a full turn now, then remove this card from the game.

openingLines.default: Time's up... because you're going down!

Cauldron.Drift.title: Drift
powers: Until the end of your next turn, whenever you shift {ShiftL} {Drift} deals 1 target 1 radiant damage, and whenever you shift {ShiftR} 1 target regains 1 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a power.
Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target gains HP, it deals 1 target 1 radiant damage.
Select a target. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target is dealt damage it regains 1 HP.

openingLines.default: we can do this now, or later. there's little change in the outcome.
openingLines.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: our struggle is backed by powers beyond this twisted loop. you're right, it doesn't matter.
openingLines.OutlanderCharacter: ironic. your own �powers� will be your undoing.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: then we just keep rewinding before the end.

Cauldron.TheKnight.title: Trace Knight
powers: [i]Trace Knight[/i] deals 1 hero target 2 psychic damage, then deals 1 target 4 melee damage, then deals himself 2 irreducible infernal damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One Hero may use a power.

Each player may discard any number of cards. if {H} cards are discarded this way, select a Knight variant with one character card, other than this one. Put that hero into play with 12 HP. Shuffle your deck and draw 4 cards. Remove this card from the game, then end your turn.

LazyFanComix.Greyhat.title: Greyhat
powers: Play 1 card. Treat any card played this way as if it were the first card played this turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may deal 1 target 1 energy damage.
One player may destroy one of their ongoing or equipment cards. If they do, they may play a different card from their trash.

openingLines.default: Keep your lines open. They can't withstand a group of linked heroes.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This threat is bigger than anything. Everyone link up.

Cauldron.Impact.title: Impact
powers: Play up to 2 ongoing cards. Return each of those cards which are still in play to your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Up to two hero ongoing cards may be played now.
Move up to 3 non-character hero cards from play to their owner's hands.

openingLines.default: If you're going to make a bad day worse, that's a bad idea.
openingLines.Cauldron.PhaseVillainCharacter: rough as a jungle out here. come visit.

Cauldron.DocHavoc.title: Doc Havoc
powers: {DocHavoc} deals 1 target 1 toxic damage. until the start of your next turn, reduce hp recovery for that target by 2.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
select a target. until the start of your next turn, reduce their hp recovery by 2.
One target regains 2 HP.

openingLines.default: I'm getting too old for this.
openingLines.Cauldron.VectorCharacter: and yet, we can't let you leave with it.

Cauldron.Terminus.title: Terminus
powers: Add 2 tokens to your wrath pool. you may draw 1 card.

Cauldron.LadyOfTheWood.title: Lady of the Wood
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 1 cold or fire damage, or 2 toxic damage. reveal the top card of the environment deck, then put it into play or back on top of its deck.

Cauldron.MagnificentMara.title: Magnificent Mara
powers: destroy 1 non-hero target with 2 or fewer hp. if no target is destroyed this way, draw 1 card.

Cauldron.Malichae.title: Malichae
powers: You may put 1 djinn into play from your hand or trash. 1 djinn hero target deals 2 hero targets and up to 2 targets 1 infernal damage each.

Cauldron.Cypher.title: Cypher
powers: Discard the top card of each augmented hero's deck. play 1 one-shot discarded this way.

Cauldron.Echelon.title: Echelon
powers: Draw 1 card. discard 1 card. for each equipment card discarded this way, put 1 tactic into play from your hand.
